newsletter: Join us and get the update from anywhere
bannerHeroDes: Start exploring our storage and experience an enjoyable and convenient experience.
ourStoryTitle: Why buy when you can rent?
ourStoryDes: An isue that we all have is that we needed something but would use it once. Paying an amount of money for something that would be used once seems to be a waste of money. At Digirent, we understand this problem and provide the customers what they need: a renting solution.
phoneCategoryBannerDes: Browse our arsenal of phones from any brands you may like!
AdTitle: National Independence Day special offer for all products
AdBody: From September 1st, 2022 to September 14th, 2022, when using our products, you can get discount up to 50% for all products! In this period ò time, you can also enjoy free transaction fees bonus gift from us! Start now!
reviewTitle1: Dont't just take our word for it...
reviewBody: Take a look through the honest reviews from previous satisfied customers that have used our service.
reviewContentBody: I have been a customer of Digirent since their first initiation. From then til nơ, there services remains excellent. The products are always in good condition when I receive it. The transaction methods are flexible and convenient. When ever I needed help, there customer service teams always done the job. Overall, 10 outta 10.
frequentlyAskedBody: Below are questions that we often received from our customers. Take a look if you run into any problems.

faqs.question: How do I open an account?
faqs.answer: You can create account simply by clicking the sign up button from the login interface. After that just fill in the required information and verified your email. After that you can start renting.

faqs.question: How much is delivery?
faqs.answer: The delivery fees variate depends on the distance from our company to your personal address. You can see the estimated delivery fees when you checkout your cart.

faqs.question: Can I cancel my rental before return date?
faqs.answer: You can return the products sooner than your order. However, please noted that we have no refund policy.

faqs.question: What happen if I damage the products?
faqs.answer: Depends on the damage level, your indemnify will vary from paying just the maintenance fee or the entire products.

faqs.question: What happen if we receive a damaged product?
faqs.answer: In this case, please contact us immediately to receive further support.

faqs.question: Pandemic concerns
faqs.answer: We do follow the safety protocols provided by the National Ministry of Health when maintain and handle our products. Learn more at: https://covid19.gov.vn/

AboutFirstSect: Remember when you need a camera but did not have it? Would you buy it if you know you would not use it the second time? At Digirent, we understand what the you need. Now, you can enjoy renting anything you want at a reasonable cost and high quality products.
AboutSecondSectP1: With Digirent, you can explore thoudsand of products from different categories and brands. Our products are strictly examined before handling to the customers so we can guarantee about the quality of our products. If you are curious about our
AboutSecondSectP2: policy. Dive in and enjoy a never before experience!
AboutUsContent: We, the people at Digirent believe that we have a duty to create and provide the world with a proper rental solution. Having use many traditional rental service, we understand that there are many problems within the system. Here are why you should choose Digirent:
Quote: Treat the customer like you are that customer
FeaturesContent: With Digirent, we included all the basic search and filter functions, making it easier for customer to navigate through products. Not only that, our UI/UX was design thoroughly and simple, ensuring that all even new customers can get used to in no time. We also enforce the customer privacy by verifying their email at sign up phase, you can get more details by taking a look customer personal information policy.
TechnologyContent: Here are the technologies that we used for our website.
MeetOurTeamContent: Each members has their own position during the build. You can know more about them with the information below.
YouNeedToAgree: You need to agree to our policies.
Name: Name
EmailSentPageTitle: We are glad that you are with us! We have sent a reset link to your email address

Error2: Your password must be at least 8 characters!

BySelecting: By selecting this, you agree to the
PrivacyPolicySubContent: At Digirent, accessible from digirent.dev, one of our main priorities is the privacy of our visitors. This Privacy Policy document contains types of information that is collected and recorded by Digirent and how we use it.
PrivacyPolicyAdditionalQ: If you have additional questions or require more information about our Privacy Policy, do not hesitate to contact us.
PrivacyPolicyContent: This Privacy Policy applies only to our online activities and is valid for visitors to our website with regards to the information that they shared and/or collect in digirent.dev. This policy is not applicable to any information collected offline or via channels other than this website.
ByUsing: By using our website, you hereby consent to our Privacy Policy and agree to its terms.
InfoCollectedContent: The personal information that you are asked to provide, and the reasons why you are asked to provide it, will be made clear to you at the point we ask you to provide your personal information.
InfoCollectedContent1: If you contact us directly, we may receive additional information about you such as your name, email address, phone number, the contents of the message and/or attachments you may send us, and any other information you may choose to provide.
InfoCollectedContent2: When you register for an account, we may ask for your contact information, including items such as name, company name, address, email address, and telephone number.
DeactivateWarning: Are you sure you want to deactivate your account ?
UnsavedWarning: Are you sure you want to leave ?
DragNDrop: Drag 'n' drop some files here, or click to select files
ThanksContent: We appreciate your order, we are currently processing it. So hang tight and we will send you confirmation very soon!
PickAt: Please come pick up your item at
